snippet: Mr. Duell’s understated comic flare enlivened Broadway shows (“A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum”), television series (“Police Squad!) and Hollywood films (One Flew Over the Cuckoo’s Nest).
abstract: William Duell, actor who played quirky roles, dies at age 88.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Duell’s understated comic flare enlivened Broadway shows (“A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum”), television series (“Police Squad!) and Hollywood films (One Flew Over the Cuckoo’s Nest).

headline.seo: William Duell, Puckish Character Actor, Dies at 88
headline.main: William Duell, Puckish Character Actor, Dies at 88
headline.print_headline: William Duell, 88, an Actor Who Played Quirky Roles
